00111     public function __construct( $table, BDDConnection $connection, & $errors )
00124     {
00125                 parent::__construct();
00126         
00127                 $errors = NULL;
00128                 
00129         if ( ! $connection->isConnected ( ) )
00130                 {
00131                         $errors = new Errors();
00132                         $errors->Add( new BDDError( BDDError::CONNECTION_CLOSED, 'Connexion close, impossible d\'instancier une Table.') );
00133                         
00134                         return;
00135                 }
00136                 
00137                 if ( ($tabex = $connection->TableExists ( $table ) ) instanceOf Errors )
00138                 {
00139                         $errors = $tabex;
00140                         
00141                         return;
00142                 }
00143                 unset ( $tabex );
00144                 
00145                 
00146                 $this->structure = & $connection->TableDescription ( $table );
00147                 $this->bDDConnection = $connection;
00148                 $this->tableName = $table;
00149     } //---- End of constructor
00150         
00151     function __destruct( )
00155         {
00156                 parent::__destruct();
00157         } //----- End of Destructor
